::Spears::

She held Striker's hand in hers and gave him a light squeeze.  She 
knew that one day, they would have time for each other.  She was 
really beginning to hate this war. But, duty called and she would 
have to put her feelings aside for now. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods, looking down at Spears.
> 
> "We'll help," he says, looking back at Bluestreak, "But we need 
some info on 
> this guy."
